body: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? same as issue 511 , just with Clone. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Progenitor Mimic + Clone: triggered ability not copied
content:
_From [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/) on March 13, 2014 21:29:51_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? same as issue 511 , just with Clone. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
